name: Mask of Orc
description: ATK upon Orcs increase by 40%, and DMG resistance against Orcs increases by 20%

ATK upon Orcs increase by 57%, and DMG resistance against Orcs increases by 28%

story: A mask modeled after the face of an Orc. It inspires a brutish desire for combat.
